item.title: Jacobi method
item.description: Introduction Jacobi method is a standard iterative scheme for solving the linear system $Ax=b$. It is part of what is known as relaxation-based methods, together with Gauss-Seidel. The basic idea is to write the diagonal product as a function of off-diagonal ones.
